name: Slimes, Caves and Ancient Cities
description:
Slimes, Caves and Ancient Cities is a game in which you play as an archaeologist who got lost in a cave while searching for a lost city! Can you find the lost cities and escape the cave?

Controls: "a" and "d" to move left and right. Space to jump

In order to find the ancient city you have to go through 4 levels of a randomly generated cave

To go to the next level of the cave you need to find a tunnel that will take you to the next level when you get close.

This game is my first game that uses randomly generated terrain. The game was made in about 8 hours. Game was made in Unity

(Sorry for my English if I wrote something wrong but it's not my main language)
